document.heading: Tenant Security Deposits Clarification Amendment Act of 2012

history.narrative: Law 19-140, the “Tenant Security Deposits Clarification Amendment Act of 2012”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 19-190, which was referred to the Committee on Housing and Workforce Development. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on February 7, 2012, and March 6, 2012, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on April 9, 2012, it was assigned Act No. 19-343 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 19-140 became effective on June 7, 2012.
